desc: 180° Box is here to inspire pamper, support you on your selfcare & lifestyle journey, New theme and products each month and will include body, beauty, style, home décor & treats 180degree aim to inspire self-care & happiness in every box through mindfully curated products to remind you to take a break and enjoy!

layout.text: Discover Something New Each Month with The Lifestyle Box by 180 Degree.
GET YOUR BOX OR GIFT IT!
